sub_title: COO/IT Director, Connects Business and IT | Strategic Decision Making - IT Focused | International, Finance Based Track Record | Builds Empowered  Teams | Transition and Optimization of Business Processes
summary:
The strategic transition, integration and optimisation of IT and operational processes have been a leading theme during my entire career in the banking industry. And with a track record at the most senior levels at ABN AMRO, amongst which CIO of the international businesses and also leading the integration between Fortis and ABN AMRO. With a keen eye for the 'human factor' in work and a passion for working in high performing teams, I have always tried to achieve results with a good sense for pragmatism. I would like to use this knowledge and experience in a new role in another complex business environment with a challenging IT and change agenda. 

❶ COO/IT Director, connects business and IT.
Throughout my entire career I have been focused on alignment between business and IT. Understanding both business itself and its (future) needs, as well as IT capabilities and its limitations.

★ Responsible (reporting on board level) for strategic alignment between business and IT, for instance as CIO International and also while leading the integration between Fortis and ABN AMRO.
★ Pragmatic approach and feasible solutions
★ A good eye for the human factor in IT change

❷ International, finance based track record.
I have been responsible for transition of the IT and Operations functions in various countries (Asia: Singapore, Hong Kong; Europe: Belgium, Germany, France, Luxembourg; Americas: US, Brazil). And as such a track record in:

★ Implementation of new IT systems in the various countries
★ Transformation of the IT and Operations organisations in these countries
★ Supporting these countries with various central IT and Operations solutions

❸ Builds empowered teams.
I firmly belief that operating within teams and together with teams is key in obtaining results. I’m known for:

★ Creating self-supporting teams achieving their own targets
★ Taking care of a good working climate and inspiring environment

❹ Transition and optimisation of business processes.
I had the pleasure to lead a number of key transition and optimisation activities:

★ Introduction of new IT systems within existing organisations
★ Transition of the IT and Operations organisations 
★ Outsourcing of existing IT and Operations functions 
★ Introduction of new working methods within existing IT organisations (for example Agile and Cloud Computing)

profile_positions.description: As IT Director responsible for the development and service provision of all IT functions used by the judicial system in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Director of Information Technology

profile_positions.description: I have in this period transitioned my CIO responsibilities, and have as executive been responsible for both Private Banking as well as Corporate Banking related key international transformation and migration initiatives. Most notable result in this period was the integration of a newly acquired bank towards already existing offices.
profile_positions.title: Director of IT

profile_positions.description:
As CIO International responsible for alignment about demand and supply of the IT function for all international businesses and as such reporting at board level. Targets were a stable systems environment, and in time and on budget delivery of changes. I managed an international team in various countries. The following specific achievements are worth noting: 
- Main achievement in this period has been to not only centralise the application landscape internationally for Corporate Banking, but also use this with adaptions in the various countries for the Private Banking business line, resulting in a homogeneous systems landscape internationally. 
- A transformation of the IT organisation from a traditional department orientation towards an organisation working according to the Agile methodology. This – together with the implementation of related tools and procedures – meant a significant increase in pace of software delivery. 
- Another achievement was the deployment of key applications onto either an on-premise private cloud, as well as the use of public cloud technology, leading to standardisation of software products, and a more flexible way of developing.
profile_positions.title: Chief Information Officer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the operations of the ABN AMRO international network (consisting of Corporate Banking and Private Banking), supporting businesses outside of The Netherlands with operations staff both locally as well as centrally. Target was a flawless performance in transaction processing together with an increase in efficiency (and saving cost).
profile_positions.title: Head Of Operations

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the integration process of ABN AMRO Netherlands and Fortis Netherlands, and as such reporting to the Board of Directors of the newly formed ABN AMRO. In this role heading a team responsible for planning, overall coordination and communication of the integration. In that same period heading the CIO Office, reporting to the Group CIO, and setting-up the new IT organisation following the integration of the two banks.
profile_positions.title: Chief Transformation Officer

profile_positions.description: IT manager in various roles within the Wholesale Banking division, spanning areas as Project Management, Test Management, and Vendor Management. All against the back-drop of an IT organisation in transformation from in-house development by permanent staff members towards managing an outsourced development and support organisation based upon clearly defined service levels. An important achievement in that period was the negotiation of an application development contract with various outsourcing vendors and the transformation of the own IT organisation operating in various locations (mainly London, Amsterdam and New York).
profile_positions.title: IT Manager

profile_positions.description: After an initial period as management trainee, started at ABN AMRO in the role of project manager and responsible for the management of key projects in the Investment Banking Division, and focused at Treasury and Markets.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: While at Cap Gemini, was exclusively assigned to PTT Telecom, and tasked with the responsibility to restructure one of the Telecom Regions. This included conducting cost/revenue reviews, setting-up HR assessments, initiation of IT/process change, and execution of a physical re-location.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
